item.title: New Years Promo
item.description:
To express our appreciation for your continued support in DarkRO: Rebirth even throughout the difficult times, we are giving extra RoK Points & Freebies!
Your support means so much to us and the community. We would like to THANK everyone for the continued support!
PROMO DURATION: Until Feb 5, 2021
Donation Promo:
+30% More on any amount of RoK Points
Note: For easiest conversion you can Google.com the 'RoK Points amount + 30%' and get the result.
For different payment method and PHP to USD conversion visit: https://dark-ro.com
Double Bonus Points Event: We will be having a Double Points Events on following:
X2 Gold Points earned in Gold Room - 3 days
X2 Arena Points earned on Monster Arena - 3 days
X2 KoE Points earned every KoE
X2 WoE Points earned on WoE
Lotti: Saturday ( Jan 30,2020 ) and Sunday ( Jan 31,2020 )
NPC: Aura Master (prontera 163 233)
With every $100 donation you will received 1 Aura Coupon that allows you to change your Aura Colors (LHZ, God, Elf, ROP).
Free Item : Ring Collection Box 2
With every $200 donation you will received 1 Ring Collection Box 2 that give you random as per above picture.
Free Item: Free Item: 4th Job Ticket - You can only change to 4th Job Sprite Only and Random Collection Box as per picture Above
With every $250 donation you will received 1 4th Job Ticket and Random Collection Box as per picture above.
*Exclusive Donation Ticket and Bonus Points, please check at Donation Manager Shop.*

item.title: Scheduled Server Maintenance - January 28, 2020
item.description:
Greetings citizens of the republic!
On January 28, 2020 at 1:00 AM (Server Time - GMT+8), we will be conducting a server maintenance which will require a complete server shut down in order to safely perform and implement updates and fixes to the server files. Below are few of the updates included in this scheduled maintenance.
LHZ Card Revamp
New Item Release
New Costumes
New NPC Feature
Quality of Life Improvements
Bug Fixes
The server's engines will be shut down for about 3-6 hours which includes both implementation and testing. We urge you to log off beforehand to avoid account related issues and make all the necessary preparations. For guild leaders, we advise you to check your castles and break your treasure boxes beforehand to avoid any spawn issues. We have assigned C-3PO to assist in creating the patch notes and I will be posting his list as soon as the server is back up and self-sustaining.
Please take the time to rest or join us in our official communications channels.
Facebook Fanpage - https://www.fb.com/DarkRagnarokRebirth/
Facebook Group- https://www.fb.com/groups/DRORebirth/
Discord - https://discord.io/darkrorebirth
See you again soon and may the force be with you!

item.title: Scheduled Short Server Maintenance - January 19, 2020
item.description:
Greetings citizens of the republic!
Tonight, January 19, 2020 at 11:00 PM (Server Time - GMT+8), we will be conducting a server maintenance which will require a complete server shut down in order to safely migrate the files over to the newly purchased host located in Singapore.
The server will be shut down for about 2-4 hours which includes both moving the files and testing the live server. We urge you to log off beforehand to avoid account related issues and make all the necessary preparations. Unfortunately, tomorrow's castle drops which spawns at 12:00 AM will not spawn automatically but announcements will be made if we are able to do that manually.
Please take the time to rest or join us in our official communications channels.
Facebook Fanpage - https://www.fb.com/DarkRagnarokRebirth/
Facebook Group- https://www.fb.com/groups/DRORebirth/
Discord - https://discord.io/darkrorebirth
See you again soon and may the force be with you!

item.title: Scheduled Server Maintenance - January 14, 2021
item.description:
Greetings citizens of the republic!
On January 14, 2020 at 1:00 AM (Server Time - GMT+8), we will be conducting a server maintenance which will require a complete server shut down in order to safely perform and implement updates and fixes to the server files. Below are few of the updates included in this scheduled maintenance.
WoE: SE Updates
Card Adjustments
Armor Adjustments
Security Improvements
Bugs & Fixes
Serer Host Move (Already Announced)
The server's engines will be shut down for about 5-8 hours which includes both implementation and testing. We urge you to log off beforehand to avoid account related issues and make all the necessary preparations. For guild leaders, we advise you to check your castles and break your treasure boxes beforehand to avoid any spawn issues. We have assigned C-3PO to assist in creating the patch notes and I will be posting his list as soon as the server is back up and self-sustaining.

item.title: Scheduled Server Maintenance - December 23, 2020
item.description:
Greetings citizens of the republic!
On December 23, 2020 at 1:00 AM (Server Time - GMT+8), we will be conducting a server maintenance which will require a complete server shut down in order to safely perform and implement updates and fixes to the server files. Below are few of the updates included in this scheduled maintenance.
Content Feature Quality Improvements
Quality of Life Improvements
Christmas Content
Item Balance Tweaks
New Items
New Quest
Bug Fixes
The server's engines will be shut down for about 6-8 hours which includes both implementation and testing. We urge you to log off beforehand to avoid account related issues and make all the necessary preparations. For guild leaders, we advise you to check your castles and break your treasure boxes beforehand to avoid any spawn issues. We have assigned C-3PO to assist in creating the patch notes and I will be posting his list as soon as the server is back up and self-sustaining.
Please take the time to rest or join us in our official communications channels.
